name: Down The Rabbit Hole (itch) (RedSponge)
description:
Venture down the rabbit hole in this avoiding-things-that-fall-on-you game :D

Use arrows to move, X/Space to glide.

Cakes make you bigger and allow you to break stuff, Drinks make you smaller and faster!

This game was made in a few days for the 16th LibGDX Jam (March 2021) by me (RedSponge), with help from TheCrispyToasty. Expect bugs!

Credits:

Music - RedSponge
Art - RedSponge & TheCrispyToasty
Code n' Stuff - RedSponge

Sounds:
cloth waving - https://freesound.org/people/nextmaking/sounds/85987/
cloth flaps - https://freesound.org/people/Sauron974/sounds/188733/
